abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert tribute to cabaret singer Bobby Short, performed by Clint Holmes at the Cafe Carlyle.
snippet: Clint Holmes presents a tribute to Bobby Short at the Café Carlyle, his musical home for decades.
lead_paragraph: Clint Holmes presents a tribute to Bobby Short at the Café Carlyle, his musical home for decades.

headline.main: A Bobby Short Tribute Is Exuberant and Reverent
headline.print_headline: A Bobby Short Tribute Is Exuberant and Reverent
headline.seo: Clint Holmes Tribute to Bobby Short at Carlyle - Review
